channel.title: Making a admin!
channel.description:
hi, i have a question, i know how to make some one a admin. go to characters change rights to 3. i change it. then i log in but i am not a admin? i reopen the character and when i look to the characters right it is 0 again! i cannot change anything! what's wrong?
i log out before i try it, but it still doesnt working! how can i get this working!

item.title: Making a admin!
item.dc:creator: @burq burq
item.description:
@burq wrote:

well, i use testscape, i change the rights to 2 or 3 but notthing happens and it automaticly changes it self to 1

Read full topic

item.title: Making a admin!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Try logging out, changing the rights to 2 (for an admin) or 3 (for the owner), then log back in. And I’m not sure if this is what you’re doing but when you change the rights, you do NOT need to compile your files.

Read full topic

item.title: Making a admin!
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

What source are you using? And maybe try removing anything you recently coded/edited?

Read full topic
